old_key.name: old_key
old_key.description: A small rusty key. Use this item to unlock a door.

evil_plan.name: evil_plan
evil_plan.description: A crumpled piece of paper with an evil plan scribbled on it. It details the cultists' plan to summon a demon and wreak havoc on the nearby town. Reading this gives you insight into their motives.

sword.name: sword
sword.description: A small, sharp sword. Equip this item to boost your attack.

armor.name: armor
armor.description: A squeky set of armor. Equip this item to boost your defense.
